name: Eretria's Legacy
description:
Once again, the great power of Darkness found his way out of the vault, where he had been locked in for eon by a group of brave heroes, who managed to weaken him and free the galaxy of his evil reign. Returning stronger and fiercer than ever before, the All Father of Darkness will not tolerate anything and will destroy everything that prevents him from obtaining once lost dominion.

Task: kill all enemies == you win!

Keep that in mind youu can't  die :DDD

You can give us feedback by filling in the survey. <3

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdnFAT1Vi8HzWf9mc7LgJPldTWK9an3hfjsQYAVu6EuxWlJHA/viewform?usp=sf_link

Controlls:

Movements: WASD

Jumping: Space

Shooting: Right Click 

Running: Shift
